name: WorldScanner
description: The WorldScanner class is a powerful tool in JSMacros for efficiently scanning the Minecraft world and finding specific blocks based on customizable filters. This class provides high-performance block searching capabilities with caching optimizations for repeated scans.
overview:
The WorldScanner is designed to search through Minecraft chunks and identify blocks that match specific criteria. It features:

- **High Performance**: Optimized scanning algorithms with optional parallel processing
- **Caching**: Results are cached to improve performance on repeated scans
- **Flexible Filtering**: Support for both block-level and block state-level filtering
- **Multiple Scan Types**: Support for chunk-based, area-based, spherical, and player-reachable scanning
- **Counting Capabilities**: Can return either positions or counts of matching blocks

methods.name: scanAroundPlayer
methods.description: Scans chunks around the player's current position.

parameters.name: chunkRange
parameters.description: Range of chunks to scan around the player (0 = only current chunk, 1 = 3x3 area)

methods.name: scanChunkRange
methods.description: Scans chunks around a specified center point.
examples:
// Scan around chunk coordinates (10, 15)
const positions = scanner.scanChunkRange(10, 15, 2);

methods.name: scanCubeArea
methods.description: Scans a cubic area around a center position.

methods.name: scanCubeArea
methods.signature: scanCubeArea(x1, y1, z1, x2, y2, z2)
methods.description: Scans a rectangular area between two coordinates.
examples:
// Scan from (100, 60, 200) to (110, 70, 210)
const positions = scanner.scanCubeArea(100, 60, 200, 110, 70, 210);

methods.name: scanCubeAreaInclusive
methods.signature: scanCubeAreaInclusive(x1, y1, z1, x2, y2, z2)
methods.description: Scans a rectangular area with both coordinates inclusive.

methods.name: scanSphereArea
methods.description: Scans a spherical area around a center position.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: Radius of the sphere in blocks

methods.name: scanReachable
methods.description: Scans for blocks within player's reach distance.
examples:
// Find all reachable ore blocks
const reachable = scanner.scanReachable();

methods.name: scanReachable
methods.description: Scans for reachable blocks from a specific position.

parameters.name: strict
parameters.description: Whether to check block outlines (default: true)

methods.name: scanClosestReachable
getBlocksInChunk
methods.description: Gets a count of blocks matching the criteria in a specific chunk.

parameters.name: ignoreState
parameters.description: Whether to combine different states of the same block

methods.name: getBlocksInChunks
methods.description: Gets block counts across multiple chunks.

methods.name: getCachedAmount
methods.description: Gets the number of cached block states for performance monitoring.
